extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
implements org.atmosphere.di.ServletContextProvider, AtmosphereService

removeAtmosphereHandler

public void removeAtmosphereHandler(String hMapping)
Description copied from interface: AtmosphereService
Remove the existing AtmosphereHandler linked to the given mapping.

Specified by:
removeAtmosphereHandler in interface AtmosphereService
Parameters:
hMapping - The existing AtmosphereHandler mapping.

addAtmosphereHandler

public void addAtmosphereHandler(String hMapping,
                                 org.atmosphere.cpr.AtmosphereHandler handler)
Description copied from interface: AtmosphereService
Add a new AtmosphereHandler to the framework with the given mapping. Be aware that the mapping is added to the atmosphere root, if the root is /atmosphere, then the handler will be accessible through the /atmosphere/ address.

Specified by:
addAtmosphereHandler in interface AtmosphereService
Parameters:
hMapping - The AtmosphereHandler mapping. (e.g /toto)
handler - The AtmosphereHandler to be added.
